alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:53AM EDT until July 25 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Schuyler County in central New York... Western Chemung County in central New York... Southern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 153 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenwood, or 14 miles south of Hornell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Campbell, Caton, Lindley and Painted Post. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
